definition: to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The drag and drop feature allows you to drag an appointment, for example, to a new time.
sentences.chinese: 拖放功能允许您将一个约会拖动到一个新的时间。

sentences.english: Is it possible to make the dialog draggable even after removing the titlebar?
sentences.chinese: 这可能使对话即使除去标题栏拖动？

sentences.english: The value the slider shows. This determines the position of the draggable thumb.
sentences.chinese: 滑动条显示的值，这个确定拖动滑块的位置。

sentences.english: All the js code, is a gold Code can drag the lines of js.
sentences.chinese: 全部为js代码，是一款金典的可以拖动线条的js。

sentences.english: To navigate you have to drag the bubble upon the layout.
sentences.chinese: 你要浏览时只需拖动布局上的气泡。

sentences.english: You can drop and drag the shortcut to other locations.
sentences.chinese: 你可以下拉并拖动创建的快捷方式到其他地方。

sentences.english: You can also drag certain artifacts from various views.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以从各种视图中拖动某些构件。

sentences.english: Another effective method is to make the arrow keys active during a drag operation.
sentences.chinese: 另一个有效的方法是在拖动操作期间激活箭头键。

sentences.english: Hold Shift and drag your mouse from the top of your document to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 按住Shift键并拖动您的文档从上到下您的鼠标。

sentences.english: To tweak a path by pushing, select it and drag over it.
sentences.chinese: 用推压的方法扭曲路径，选择路径，然后在上面拖动。

sentences.english: Just make sure you press Alt before you press the mouse button and drag.
sentences.chinese: 只需确保先按住Alt键再按鼠标并拖动。
制作一个单一浮点数可拖动控制柄。

sentences.english: Except for the first column in the tree layout, all of the columns are moveable.
sentences.chinese: 除了树型布局的第一列外，其余列都是可以拖动的。

sentences.english: Cannot creat diretctory on virtual machine. Aborting the drag and drop operation.
sentences.chinese: 从虚拟机往物理机拖动拷贝还没有发现有这个问题。

sentences.english: The farther you drag, the less the intensity of the effect.
sentences.chinese: 越向左边拖动滑条，滤镜效果的强度就会越弱。

definition: to hook onto/to hitch onto/to catch onto
